content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "google" command to search for the "Best time of year to kayak in Norway's fjords" and received a list of URLs. I used the "browse_website" command to visit the websites. I also used the "write_to_file" command to add information about the best time to kayak in Norway to my "adventures.txt" file. My plan is to visit Norway's fjords during the recommended time and document my kayaking adventure through writing and photography.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "norway_kayaking.txt", "text": "Best time to kayak in Norway\'s fjords: Summer months\\n\\nPlan:\\n- Research transportation options to Norway\\n- Research lodging options in Norway\\n- Research equipment rental options in Norway\\n- Make a detailed itinerary for my trip"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
